name: Emily Wong
summary: Gap in employment due to family caregiving. Previously experienced project manager with 5 years in tech industry. Completed online courses during career break to update skills and stay current with industry trends. Seeking to return to workforce with flexible arrangement.

experience.title: Technical Project Manager
responsibilities: Managed 5-10 concurrent client projects with budgets up to $500K
Led cross-functional teams of designers, developers, and QA engineers
Delivered 30+ projects on time and within budget, maintaining 95% client satisfaction
Implemented agile methodologies and project management tools (JIRA, Asana)
Managed stakeholder communications and conducted regular status meetings

experience.title: Project Coordinator
responsibilities: Coordinated project schedules and tracked deliverables
Supported senior project managers on client accounts
Maintained project documentation and status reports
Facilitated team meetings and captured action items

activities_during_break: Finished online courses: Agile Project Management, Scrum Master certification
Volunteered as project coordinator for local non-profit (2022-2023)
Maintained industry knowledge through webinars and professional reading
Part-time freelance consulting for 2 small business clients (2023-2024)

availability: Seeking full-time or part-time role with flexible work arrangement
